key.name: dbus
key.description: Invoke the functionality through the DBus (restart the extension to take effect). Ex: `gdbus call --session --dest org.gnome.Shell --object-path /org/gnome/Shell/Extensions/RunOrRaise --method org.gnome.Shell.Extensions.RunOrRaise.Call ",firefox,,"`

key.name: switch-back-when-focused
key.summary: Switch back to previous window when focused

key.name: minimize-when-unfocused
key.description: Minimizes your target window when unfocusing.

key.name: center-mouse-to-focused-window
key.summary: After focus move mouse to window center

key.name: move-window-to-active-workspace
key.summary: Move window to current workspace before focusing
key.description: If the window is on a different workspace, moves the window to the workspace you're currently viewing.

key.name: isolate-workspace
key.summary: Switch windows on the active workspace only

key.name: verbose
key.description: Provide debug information. (Highlight layered shortcuts by a yellow rectangle etc.)
